snippet: The winner of 11 N.B.A. titles as coach of the Bulls and the Lakers, Phil Jackson brings instant credibility to a franchise that desperately needs it.
abstract: New York Knicks plan to introduce Phil Jackson, former coach with unrivaled credentials, as team's new president; Jackson, who has never before held a front-office position, will face uphill battle in resuscitating the Knicks after years of mismanagement and dismal seasons.
lead_paragraph: The winner of 11 N.B.A. titles as coach of the Bulls and the Lakers, Phil Jackson brings instant credibility to a franchise that desperately needs it.

headline.main: Knicks Turn to Jackson to Resuscitate the Team
headline.print_headline: Knicks Turn to Jackson to Resuscitate the Team
